channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Arsenal of Democracy Can’t Be Backordered
item.description: We must push harder to build a capable American defense system for the 21st century.

item.title: Ford Pays the Price for Electric Vehicle Investments
item.description: Government mandates and subsidies drove the automaker to bet big on electric vehicles, leaving it now with a $19.5 billion loss.

item.title: The West’s Embrace Of Mass Third-World Migration Is Civilizational Suicide
item.description: The West's mass importation of Third-Worlders with no emphasis on assimilation has been, is, and will continue to be a complete failure.

item.title: Spike Lee’s Affordability Thriller
item.description: Highest 2 Lowest remakes Kurosawa for the DNC.

item.title: Australia’s Dangerous Naïveté
item.description: The atrocity at Bondi Beach was heartrending and all too predictable.
